attributes.action: provide disabled access to all public buildings and transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is for providing disabled access to all public buildings and transport.  Also, making sure roads have enough dropped curbs and pavements are not uneven.

Another problem is that disabled toilets are unisex and they don't have changing facilities.  Along with this,cash points are too high.

Also, for blind people it is difficult to cross roads so crossings need fixing to make it safe.

Disabled access is a right not a previledge!
